title: UX text: input search 02
code:
<gds-flex width="100%" padding="2xl" flex-direction="column" gap="s">
  <gds-input label="Search" value="Savigs goal">
    <gds-icon-magnifying-glass slot="lead">
      </gds-icon>
  </gds-input>
  <gds-flex border-radius="m" background="neutral-01" align-items="flex-start" gap="m" padding="xl">
    <gds-flex width="100%" flex-direction="column" gap="m">
      <gds-flex justify-content="space-between" gap="xl">
        <gds-flex flex-direction="column">
          <gds-text font="body-regular-m">We can’t find what you’re looking for. You could try checking the spelling or using fewer or more characters.
          </gds-text>
        </gds-flex>
      </gds-flex>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>
